column1: What qualifications should a reporter have ?
column2: As a reporter , he must have acute insight and language skills . At the same time , he must have good judgment , the respect for his job and tactical cooperation with others .

EOS Well , what do you think of choosing a commission representative or agent abroad to promote your sales ? EOS That's a good idea . So far , we have several agents abroad . EOS We are willing to be your agent in Thailand for hand-held tools . What do you think ? EOS That sounds good . EOS Then , what's your usual commission rate for your agents ? EOS Usually , we give a commission of 4 % to our agents . EOS 4 % is too low , I think . You see , we have a lot of work to do in sales promotion , such as advertising on radio or TV , printing booklets , leaflets , catalogues and so on . It all costs money , 4 % is not enough . EOS Don't worry . We'll allow you a higher commission rate if your sales score a substantial increase . EOS You mean to saya EOS It sounds OK . Then how do you pay the commission ?
column2: We may deduct the commission from the invoice value directly or remit it to you after payment .

Do you have any cakes ? EOS We have various birthday cakes and also ice cream cakes . EOS I'll just take a cheesecake . EOS Will that be all ? EOS Yes .
column2: Your total is forty three dollars and twenty cents .

column1: Good morning , ladies and gentlemen , we are happy you have all come out for our training workshop . Today we have a great line-up of speakers to talk to you . First on our program is a well-renown expert in the field of international economic development , Harvard's own Dr . James Smith . Dr . Smith has been involved in economic research for over twenty years , and has taught at Harvard since 1995 . And now , without further adieu , we'd like to welcome Mr . James Smith .
column2: Thank you , Mr . Jackson , ladies and gentlemen , colleagues , friends . The subject of my talk is international relations in a morgen world . I plan to say a few words about the current situation in the Middle East and how it affects world economy . I'd like to give you an overview of the way that the economies of seemingly unrelated countries are intertwined . I've divided my talk into three parts , first an overview of international relations , second a discussion of current political situations , and lastly trends for the future . My presentation will take about two hours , but there will be a twenty-minute break in the middle . We'll stop for lunch at 12 .

column2: All new members are likely to ask the same questions . Haha . I can understand that . Every month you have three days off , besides the weekends and some important holidays . After you've been here for a year , you qualify for a one-week vacation . The leave less than a half-day should predict for an hour , and more than a half-day should predict three days .

EOS It is especially important for the graduates who step into the job market for the first time . EOS You'd better prepare what you are going to say in advance , in order to have a good performance in the interview . EOS The contents should be mainly descriptions of your background . And the length depends on the particular situation . EOS Only when you are aware of what the interviewer will be interested in , can you make a targeted preparation . EOS To sell yourself successfully , you should leave the interviewer a deep impression . EOS Selling yourself should go straight to the point , and the statement should be clear and brief . EOS It should also be truthful and realistic . Do not blindly blow your own horn .
column2: You should particularly state your strong points which are closely related to the position you are applying for .

column1: Just as the saying goes , every potter praises his own pot . You should pay special attention to selling yourself properly in the interview . EOS It is especially important for the graduates who step into the job market for the first time . EOS You'd better prepare what you are going to say in advance , in order to have a good performance in the interview . EOS The contents should be mainly descriptions of your background . And the length depends on the particular situation . EOS Only when you are aware of what the interviewer will be interested in , can you make a targeted preparation . EOS To sell yourself successfully , you should leave the interviewer a deep impression . EOS Selling yourself should go straight to the point , and the statement should be clear and brief . EOS It should also be truthful and realistic . Do not blindly blow your own horn . EOS You should particularly state your strong points which are closely related to the position you are applying for . EOS While you should not omit your weak points , they need to be described appropriately EOS Time permitted , you could add certain examples to your description .
column2: Besides , in the interview , it is best that you make corresponding adjustments to apply your prepared contents flexibly .

EOS Do you keep a stock of these things ? EOS In some cases , such as the wristwatches , which always have a steady market , we keep a stock in London and act as distributors as well as agents . Generally , however , we pass on the orders of our clients to the manufacturers for supply . We are paid for our service , of course . EOS That is , your commission . EOS Yes , our commission is very reasonable . We usually get a 10 % commission of the amount on every deal . EOS Our agents in other areas usually get a 3-5 % commission . EOS The European market is not familiar with your products . You have competitors from Japan and other continental countries . At the beginning of our campaign , there is sales resistance to overcome , we must send out salesmen to do a lot of traveling and spend a considerable amount of money on advertising in news - papers and TV programs . A 10 % commission will not leave us much . EOS According to your estimate , what is the maximum annual turn - over you can fulfill , in round figures , of course ? EOS We will always do our utmost to enlarge the business , as our remuneration increases with the turnover , but we will not guar - ante anything , at least not to begin with . EOS We appreciate very much your intention to push the sale of our products . But our suggestion to you , Mr . Bergeron , as a preliminary step , is to do a little research into the market ... EOS Do you mean to say you refuse us the agency ? EOS Mr . Bergeron , you leave us no alternative . We can not give you an exclusive agency of the whole European market without having the slightest idea of your possible annual marketing turnover . Besides our price is worked out according to the costing . A 10 % commission means an increase in our price . We must have the reaction of the buyers in this respect . EOS Oh , that's just too bad . I intended to make great efforts in selling your products .
column2: Well , we can still carry on our business relationship without the agreement . To start the ball rolling , we will provide you with price lists , catalogues and some samples . Only when you have a thorough knowledge of the marketing possibilities of our products , can we then discuss further details .

column1: How does the political system work in your country ? EOS We have hundreds of constituencies and the voters in each one elect a member of parliament . Most people call them mp ' s . EOS Each mp belongs to a political party , right ? EOS Almost all of them do . A few are independent . That means that they do not belong to a party . If one party more than half of the mp ' s . they form a government . That means that they choose a prime Finist EOS What ' s a cabinet ?
column2: This is a small group of people-perhaps 25 mp ' s who are usually ministers . They make all the big decision and discuss laws and policy .

column1: How does the political system work in your country ? EOS We have hundreds of constituencies and the voters in each one elect a member of parliament . Most people call them mp ' s . EOS Each mp belongs to a political party , right ? EOS Almost all of them do . A few are independent . That means that they do not belong to a party . If one party more than half of the mp ' s . they form a government . That means that they choose a prime Finist EOS What ' s a cabinet ? EOS This is a small group of people-perhaps 25 mp ' s who are usually ministers . They make all the big decision and discuss laws and policy . EOS Can any mp make a law ?
column2: Any mp can present a law to parliament . The proposed law is debated and voted on . If it is accepted , it becomes law .

column1: Good morning , Kate . Long time no see . EOS Good morning , Vera , Nice to meet you . EOS Kate , I know you ' Ve been a stewardess for more than one year . And I ' ll have an interview on stewardess tomorrow . Can you tell me some etiquette about the interview ? EOS Of course . First you should do up your long hair and do make up but not too thick . EOS Is there anything else I should pay attention to ?
column2: Yes , when you attend the interview , you should pay attention to your manner , style of conversation and expression . You should keep smiling always , being polite when you talk with the interviewer . Don't move from time to time when you sit there . And you also should know how to use eye contact .

column1: What shall we do when we find a shortage in the shipment ?

column1: What shall we do when we find a shortage in the shipment ? EOS You should do one of the two things - either to lodge a claim with the shipowner or with the insurance company . EOS Shall we leave it to the brokers ? EOS Yes . They usually do it . EOS Do they charge for that ?

column1: What shall we do when we find a shortage in the shipment ? EOS You should do one of the two things - either to lodge a claim with the shipowner or with the insurance company . column2: No , you must also obtain a statement from the shipping agent certifying that the goods were actually loaded on their vessel for shipment .

column1: Some companies use to ban dating among employees , but now they have realized it is something in avertable . People spend so much time at work . It is not surprising for one to have a crash on the other . EOS If we think positively , office love can be beneficial to company .
column2: Beneficial ? I don ' t think so . If two employees get married , they will leave at the same time for a honeymoon , or later one of them will stay at home taking care of babies . If they break up , the company will probably have to relocate one of them to make the workplace more comfortable . By any means , the company must spare extra efforts to solve problems brought by an office dating .

column2: Cranberry juice is very good for destroying harmful bacteria in your guts because it's very acidic . Wild rice is high in fibre so it's good for your guts and it's high in protein and minerals-I think it's also tastier than normal rice . Yoghurt's good because it's also rich in protein , vitamins and is also acidic . People have been making yoghurt for thousands of years and if you have it every day , your guts will be much more settled .

column1: How long will it take for our order to be delivered ?
column2: Let's see . You are importing fifty containers of textiles from China . They should be able to place your order before the end of next week . It will take 2 days for shipping to the port city of Ningpo . The freight will take 3 weeks on the open ocean and will arrive in Los Angeles approximately a month from today . Domestic shipping will be your responsibility , you can make arrangements with the pier in Los Angeles .

column1: Is the factory fully-automated ?
column2: Not completely . Our production process is partially-automated . We use robots on the production line for routine assembly jobs but some of the work is still done manually .

column1: Is the factory fully-automated ? EOS Not completely . Our production process is partially-automated . We use robots on the production line for routine assembly jobs but some of the work is still done manually .
column2: What about supply of parts to the production line ?

column1: Is the factory fully-automated ? EOS Not completely . Our production process is partially-automated . We use robots on the production line for routine assembly jobs but some of the work is still done manually . EOS What about supply of parts to the production line ?
column2: Well , the parts are automatically selected from the store room using a bar-code system . And there is an automatic feeder which takes them to the conveyor belt at the start of the production line .

column1: How many years have you done business with China ? EOS Let me see , about five years , we established our business relationship with Hua Mei of China Import & Export Corporation in 2003 . column1: I ' Ve come to hear about your offer for bristles . EOS We have the offer ready for you . EOS Why , your price has soared . It ' s almost 25 % higher than last year ' s . It would be impossible for us to push any sales at such a price . EOS I ' m a little surprised to hear you say that . You know very well that markets for bristles have gone up a great deal in recent months . The price we offer compares favorably with quotations you can get elsewhere . EOS I ' m afraid I can ' t agree with you there . I must point out your price is higher than some of the quotations we ' Ve received from other sources . EOS But you must take the quality into consideration . Everyone in the trade knows that US ' s bristles are of superior quality to those from other countries .

column1: I ' Ve come to hear about your offer for bristles . EOS We have the offer ready for you . Let me see ... here it is . 100 cases Houston Bristles , 57 mm , at 10 pounds sterling per kilogram , C . I . F European Main Ports , for shipment in June 2001 . The offer is valid for five days . EOS Why , your price has soared . It ' s almost 25 % higher than last year ' s . It would be impossible for us to push any sales at such a price . EOS I ' m a little surprised to hear you say that . You know very well that markets for bristles have gone up a great deal in recent months . The price we offer compares favorably with quotations you can get elsewhere . EOS I ' m afraid I can ' t agree with you there . I must point out your price is higher than some of the quotations we ' Ve received from other sources . EOS But you must take the quality into consideration . Everyone in the trade knows that US ' s bristles are of superior quality to those from other countries . EOS I agree that yours are of better quality . But there ' s competition from synthetic products , too . You can ' t very well ignore that . Prices for synthetic bristles haven ' t changed much over the years .
column2: There ' s practically no substitute for bristles for certain uses . That ' s why demand for natural bristles keeps rising in spite of cheaper synthetic ones . To be frank with you , if it were not for the long - standing relationship between us , we would hardly be willing to make you a firm offer at this price .

column1: I ' Ve come to hear about your offer for bristles . EOS We have the offer ready for you . Let me see ... here it is . 100 cases Houston Bristles , 57 mm , at 10 pounds sterling per kilogram , C . I . F European Main Ports , for shipment in June 2001 . The offer is valid for five days . EOS Why , your price has soared . It ' s almost 25 % higher than last year ' s . It would be impossible for us to push any sales at such a price . EOS I ' m a little surprised to hear you say that . column2: Well , we ' ll have a lot of difficulties in persuading our clients to buy at this price . But I ' ll have to try , I suppose .

EOS I can see that from your resume.Your last position was marketing director for a pharmaceutical company , is that right ? Later , why did you decide to leave your former post ?
column2: I felt after five years in one place , I was ready for something new . I would like to have a job that is challenging , something that I can see and do new things every day . Usually we have a set form which is printed . We just fill in the printed forms and send it to the person or the offices concerned in the company .
column2: Of course , let me find one for you .

column1: How did your company's fundraiser go ?
column2: The fundraiser events went really well . We were able to partner with a few of our competitors , all in fun of course , to sponsor a marathon for the American Cancer Society . All of the people who participated it had a great time , and we were able to raise a lot of money to contribute to cancer research .

We were able to partner with a few of our competitors , all in fun of course , to sponsor a marathon for the American Cancer Society . column2: So how does it work ? How were you able to make money with the marathon ?

column1: How did your company's fundraiser go ? EOS The fundraiser events went really well . We were able to partner with a few of our competitors , all in fun of course , to sponsor a marathon for the American Cancer Society . All of the people who participated it had a great time , and we were able to raise a lot of money to contribute to cancer research . EOS So how does it work ? How were you able to make money with the marathon ?
column2: Each of the runners that participated the marathon race paid a ten dollar entrance fee . Also , they went door to door to get sponsors who pledged a dollar per mile that participants ran . All in all we were able to raise several thousand dollars .

column1: How did your company's fundraiser go ? EOS The fundraiser events went really well . Also , they went door to door to get sponsors who pledged a dollar per mile that participants ran . All in all we were able to raise several thousand dollars .
column2: Sounds like a great deal for the American Cancer Society .

column1: How did your company's fundraiser go ? EOS The fundraiser events went really well . column2: In all honesty , it's also a great deal for our company . The exposure that we gained from sponsoring an invent like this was great for our image in the community . We accomplished as much as last year's advertising campaign , plus we were able to do a little fundraising for a good cause .

EOS I think I will give you a 3 months ' trial . The salary for this period is 800 yuan a month with no bonus . After that period if we both feel satisfied , a formal contract would be signed . EOS When am I supposed to start working ? EOS Next monday . Bring your resume and diploma with you . EOS Yes , I will . Thank you , Mr . White . Goodbye !
column2: Goodbye !

EOS well , I was going to drive to Birmingham to see some friends . EOS you might want to change your plans . With the cold and wet weather that we're supposed to have tomorrow , the roads are going to be rather slippery . EOS I suppose I should . I don't like driving in dangerous weather conditions . Do you have any plans for tomorrow ? EOS I just have to go to class tomorrow afternoon . EOS if you're lucky , it'll get cancelled and you can have a snow day ! EOS if that happens , then I'll invite you over and we can drink hot cocoa and watch movies . EOS that sounds like fun .

I don ' t know if you ' re aware son , but there has been a lot of turmoil in the markets recently . There have already been half a million layoffs in the last few months , and we have no idea how the proposed stimulus package will impact the economy . There ' s just too much instability . I wouldn ' t feel comfortable investing in this climate .
column2: But look at it this way , every challenge is an opportunity.And anyway , I ' m not talking about investing in the domestic market . There are emerging markets that promise great returns . Look at China , for example.they have 1.4 billion people , half a billion of whom have recently entered the middle class . Here alone , the aggregate demand for consumer goods represents an amazing wealth generating opportunity .

But he said , no , the box is still in its plastic wrap from the store.If it's opened , other people won't believe it's new . EOS So he had the boxes wrapped in plastic . EOS Yes , it was the kind of perfect plastic wrap that comes with new products.Look , it even had a bar-code price sticker on it ! It looked brand new . EOS But why would a guy be selling new video cameras for twenty dollars ? EOS He said he had to get rid of them . They were stolen . EOS Aha ! Now I understand.You were trying to buy stolen goods on the sidewalk.So , what I think is , you deserve to get cheated !
column2: C'mon , don't blame me ! I thought it was a new camera . We could use it.We were even thinking about buying a camera . I don't understand how he could have such a perfect-looking box .

column1: Doctor , save my baby , please EOS What symptoms does he have ? EOS He has had a fever for one day . Just now at home , he had febrile convulsions with teeth and fists clenched and eyes turned up . We were at a loss what to do . We called an ambulance and brought the baby here . EOS How long did the convulsion last ? EOS About 3 minutes . EOS Does he have any other complaints ? EOS Three days ago , he began to cough , sneeze and have a running nose . Yesterday , he began to have a fever . EOS Have you taken his temperature ? EOS It was 38 ° C this morning and it was 39 ° C just now . EOS Let me examine him to see if there is any rash . No rash . EOS Is it serious ? Is it meningitis ? EOS No , it is not meningitis . Just a high fever and convulsions , which results from a virus upper respiratory tract inflection . EOS Does he have to be admitted to hospital ?
column2: No . No need for admission . I'll give the baby analgia nose drops to bring down the temperature first . Then I will give you a prescription . The pink tablets are used for his fever . When his temperature is over 38 ° C , give him one tablet . The other tablets are sedatives for his convulsions . The white liquid is for the cold . Give the baby plenty of water to drink .

column1: Doctor , save my baby , please EOS What symptoms does he have ? EOS He has had a fever for one day . EOS How long did the convulsion last ? EOS About 3 minutes . EOS Does he have any other complaints ? EOS Three days ago , he began to cough , sneeze and have a running nose . Yesterday , he began to have a fever . EOS Have you taken his temperature ? EOS It was 38 ° C this morning and it was 39 ° C just now . EOS Let me examine him to see if there is any rash . No rash . EOS Is it serious ? Is it meningitis ? EOS No , it is not meningitis . Just a high fever and convulsions , which results from a virus upper respiratory tract inflection . EOS Does he have to be admitted to hospital ? EOS No . No need for admission . I'll give the baby analgia nose drops to bring down the temperature first . Then I will give you a prescription . The pink tablets are used for his fever . When his temperature is over 38 ° C , give him one tablet . The other tablets are sedatives for his convulsions . The white liquid is for the cold . Give the baby plenty of water to drink .
column2: Thank you very much , doctor .

It is really very interesting.Also , there is a great museum of medieval European art further up north.It ' s called the Cloisters . EOS How can we get up there ? EOS You can take a bus .

EOS Well yes , I do have a number of questions , but perhaps first you could give me a brief overview I ' d like to get a little bit of an idea of your background . EOS Yes , of course . Well as you can see from the resume I ' m 27 and grew up in Brooklyn , New York , although our family moved to London when I was quite young , at around sixteen . EOS Ah I see , so you were actually educated in Europe ? EOS Yes precisely . Although I was born in the US , I would definitely call London home . But as you see I ' Ve actually spent a lot of my life moving from country to country . My Father was in the oil business before he retired so we also spent a number of years in Saudi Arabia too .
column2: Very interesting . So it seems you had quite an adventurous childhood .

I thought they take care of all the legal troubles . EOS Yes , that's often true . But you have to pay them . EOS I still think we should have a realtor.We ' re new in this country . We don't know all the laws of buying a house.And also , the realtor will inspect the house.He can tell us if the house has EOS Of course we need a home inspector.But we can hire an inspector on our own.And as for the legal problems , I have friends . They can help us . EOS So how can we find a house if we don't have a realtor ? EOS It takes a little more time . We have to check the ads in the paper.Probably also there are special real estate magazines with ads.Then we have to drive to the homes and look at them . EOS Because if the seller has a realtor , their price will be higher.He will have to pay a commission to the realtor .
column2: Hmm . It all sounds very complicated .

column1: So that concludes the introduction . Now let's move to the first part of my talk , which is about 2006 fiscal year marketing plan . So first , right off the bat , When looking at the marketing plan , tell me some of the goals that we had set this year to begin with ...
column2: We wanted to appeal to a younger set of consumers and also , in line with that goal , redo our image ...

column1: So that concludes the introduction . Now let's move to the first part of my talk , which is about 2006 fiscal year marketing plan . So first , right off the bat , When looking at the marketing plan , tell me some of the goals that we had set this year to begin with ... EOS We wanted to appeal to a younger set of consumers and also , in line with that goal , redo our image ...
column2: That's correct . If you remember , we also set a goal to double distribution in overseas markets . Now , when looking at the data to evaluate whether or not we made our goals , there are three things to consider . First , the original condition of the market , second , our marketing numbers from the previous year , and third , our final sales figures for this year . Now I want to describe for you the second and third parts . If you look at the overhead , you'll see a graph ... The blue line represents our sales from the year 2005 , the red line is the sales in 2006 ... As you can see , our sales in 2005 were quite slow to start off with , but managed to make decent performance in the last part of the year . On the other hand , you can see this year's sales took off like a rocket .

We should buy a packet of butter and a few pints of milk too . EOS I ' d like to get a jar of strawberry jam and a bottle of tomato ketchup . Do we need any meat ? EOS I think we should get half a kilo of minced beef and a few pork chops . EOS Ok . Let ' s not forget fruit and vegetables . We need a bunch of bananas , a kilo of tomatoes and a bag of potatoes . EOS We should also get a tube of toothpaste and a bar of soap . Let ' s get a tub of ice cream too . We can treat ourselves .
column2: Ok . We should get a few tins of tuna . Anything else ?
